title: B593s-931:How to do when the SIM card PIN code has been enabled?
answer:
**Note: If the PIN code has been enabled, you can’t connect the internet.** 

 First, open the web browser and enter http://192.168.1.1, then input the password after the page jump, click Log In finally.(The default user name is admin, the default password is admin) 

 Second, click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=32666), you will see the information on the PIN Management page. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=32667)


 Third, input the correct PIN code, then click Submit button. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=32668) 

 Fourth,** If you don’t want to input the PIN code every time, you can remember the PIN code.**) 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=32669)
